mapper.select: select a.busId, a.busPlate, a.busCreatetime, a.busStatus, a.busName, b.busdriverId, b.busdriverName, c.lineId, c.lineName FROM bus a left JOIN busdriver b on a.busDriverid = b.busdriverId left JOIN busline c on a.busLineid = c.lineId where a.busStatus != 4 order by a.busId desc

select a.busId, a.busPlate, a.busCreatetime, a.busStatus, a.busName, b.busdriverName, c.lineName FROM bus a left JOIN busdriver b on a.busDriverid = b.busdriverId left JOIN busline c on a.busLineid = c.lineId WHERE busName like #{key}
mapper.update: update bus set busStatus = 4 where busId =#{busId}

update bus set busStatus = 4 where busId in
#{id}

select lineId as id,lineName as name from busline

SELECT a.busId, a.busPlate, a.busCreatetime, a.busStatus, a.busName, b.busdriverId, b.busdriverName, c.lineId, c.lineName, d.fixReason, d.fixtime, d.fixId FROM harmBus d LEFT JOIN bus a on a.busId = d.busId LEFT JOIN busdriver b ON a.busDriverid = b.busdriverId LEFT JOIN busline c ON a.busLineid = c.lineId WHERE a.busStatus = 2 ORDER BY a.busId DESC
SELECT d.fixReason, d.fixtime, d.fixId, a.busId, a.busPlate, a.busCreatetime, a.busStatus, a.busName FROM harmBus d left join bus a on d.busId = a.busId WHERE d.fixId = #{id}

SELECT a.busId, a.busPlate, a.busCreatetime, a.busStatus, a.busName, b.busdriverId, b.busdriverName, c.lineId, c.lineName, d.fixLogId, d.harmId, d.fixer, d.fixLogTime, d.fixMoney, e.busId, e.fixTime, e.fixReason FROM fixLog d LEFT JOIN harmBus e on d.harmId = e.fixId LEFT JOIN bus a on a.busId = e.busId LEFT JOIN busdriver b ON a.busDriverid = b.busdriverId LEFT JOIN busline c ON a.busLineid = c.lineId ORDER BY a.busId DESC
